column4: I have a fresh install of ubuntu 10.10 netbook remix. when the system starts and desktop finishes loading, any dialog box (including mousing over the left chooser bar) causes the desktop to reset (screen goes black, desktop reloads -- not a reboot, just a refresh of desktop). Any thoughts?
this happens over and over -- the system is unusable b/c nothing can be done between resets.
log in to terminal session (CTRL+ALT+F1 at login screen) and get updated there
